verses.name: Deuteronomy 8:17
verses.text: And thou say in thine heart, My power and the might of mine hand hath gotten me this wealth.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 8:18
verses.text: But thou shalt remember the Lord thy God: for it is he that giveth thee power to get wealth, that he may establish his covenant which he sware unto thy fathers, as it is this day.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 8:19
verses.text: And it shall be, if thou do at all forget the Lord thy God, and walk after other gods, and serve them, and worship them, I testify against you this day that ye shall surely perish.
